metadata.name: Sqwizz #1
metadata.description:
Neon Wild is a personalized metaverse platform for kids and their families. Each child on the platform gets their very own Sqwizz, a lovable and huggable guide in the Neon Wild.

"Neon Wild Presents Sqwizz" is Neon Wild's first NFT collection. It contains 500 unique Sqwizz NFTs living on the Ethereum blockchain as ERC-721 tokens and hosted on IPFS. Each fully animated NFT is also a unique, playable Sqwizz in the soon-to-launch Neon Wild platform.
